name: screenshot
description: Atom editor plugin for creating code screenshots
author: Fabian Meyer

openImage.description: When enabled the screenshot will be opened in Atom once created.

includeLineNumbersAndGutter.description: When enabled the screenshot includes the gutter and line numbers.

showWrapGuide.description: When enabled the screenshot includes the wrap guide.

cornerRadius.description: If greater than zero, rounded corners will be applied to the image.
